Description.Text:
A quiet owner operated Guest Accommodation located on a tree lined cul-de-sac just ten minstes level walk from York minster, the City walls, and the City centre beyond. Parking (free) available on-site. Wi-Fi (small charge) available in most bedrooms and public areas.
The Groves is made up of three separate buildings which surround the courtyard car park. York House and The Cottage are located to the rear of the main building. All bedrooms refurbished 2009/2010. The main building was built in the late 1800's and still retains many original features such as the splendid reception staircase, leaded windows, and many of the original wood features. The hotel provides free breakfast to its guests. The hotel has no smoking policy. Please note The Groves does not have a lift - there are asmall number of ground floor rooms but please request these BEFORE booking!
Located on a quiet tree lined cul-de-sac just minutes from York City Centre.

Loft - Suite - Loft Suite offers one superking bed. Bootham 'Loft' Suite is located to the rear of the main building in a new extension. Lots of lovely touches such as the Super King Size Double bed, two separate seating areas, one for dining, and another L shaped leather sofa area to watch the 50inch HDTV and minibar. Separate bathroom and wc. Dorma windows to give light. Air conditioning and heating. Plus other features only availble in this room. Extra single bed available for an additional 30 per night.
Standard - Double - Standard Small Double rooms feature a UK standard 4foot 6inch Double Bed. These rooms all have private facilities (shower) ensuite and have everything provided (toiletries, towelling etc.). A 32inch Freeview TV is standard as is the hospitality tray of tea & coffee. Wi-Fi is accessible in most bedrooms (subject to a small charge). These rooms are great value for short stays in York.
Moderate - Double - Moderate Doubles feature a UK standard 4foot6inch Double Bed. Similar to the Standard Double however these rooms generally offer more comfort with a separate seating area and fixtures and fittings of a higher standard. All have private facilities (shower) ensuite and have everything provided (toiletries, towelling etc.). A 32inch Freeview TV is standard as is the hospitality tray of tea & coffee. Wi-Fi is accessible in most bedrooms (subject to a small charge).
Standard - Single - Standard Small Single rooms feature a UK standard Single Bed. These rooms all have private facilities (shower) ensuite and have everything provided (toiletries, towelling etc.). A 32inch Freeview TV is standard as is the hospitality tray of tea & coffee. Wi-Fi is accessible in most bedrooms (subject to a small charge). These rooms are great value for short stays in York.
Moderate - Single - Moderate Singles feature a slightly larger than usual UK standard Single Bed (4foot). Similar to the Standard Single however these rooms generally offer more comfort with a separate seating area and fixtures and fittings of a higher standard. All have private facilities (shower) ensuite and have everything provided (toiletries, towelling etc.). A 32inch Freeview TV is standard as is the hospitality tray of tea & coffee. Wi-Fi is accessible in most bedrooms (subject to a small charge).
Moderate - Twin - Moderate Twins have two UK standard Single beds in the room. These rooms each have private facilities (shower) ensuite and have everything provided (toiletries, towelling etc.). A 32inch Freeview TV is standard as is the hospitality tray of tea & coffee. Wi-Fi is accessible in most bedrooms (subject to a small charge).
Moderate - Triple - Triple rooms each have three standard UK single beds in the room. Well proportioned rooms, both located in York House. They have private facilities (shower) ensuite and have everything provided (toiletries, towelling etc.). A 32inch Freeview TV is standard as is the hospitality tray of tea & coffee. Wi-Fi is accessible in most bedrooms (subject to a small charge).
Family - En_Suite - Family rooms each accommodate up to three people in a standard UK single bed and a standard UK Double bed (4foot6inch) both located in the same room. Well proportioned rooms, located on the first and second floors of the main building (no lift!). They have private facilities (shower) ensuite and have everything provided (toiletries, towelling etc.). A 32inch Freeview TV is standard as is the hospitality tray of tea & coffee. Wi-Fi is accessible in most bedrooms (subject to a small charge).
